leadership.name: Sarah Chen
leadership.title: COO & Co-founder
leadership.bio: Sarah brings 15+ years of operational excellence from McKinsey and Google. She's passionate about building high-performing teams and has scaled operations at three unicorn startups. At Drexus, she ensures we deliver consistent excellence across all client engagements.

leadership.name: David Kumar
leadership.title: CTO
leadership.bio: David is a technology leader with 20+ years building enterprise software. Former VP Engineering at Salesforce, he's architected systems processing billions of transactions. He ensures Drexus stays at the cutting edge of technology while maintaining enterprise-grade reliability.

leadership.name: Maria Rodriguez
leadership.title: VP of Engineering
leadership.bio: Maria leads our engineering teams with a focus on technical excellence and mentorship. With experience at Amazon and Netflix, she's built products used by millions. She champions our culture of continuous learning and innovation.

leadership.name: Alex Wong
leadership.title: VP of Product
leadership.bio: Alex shapes product strategy for our clients and internal tools. Previously Head of Product at Stripe and Airbnb, he's launched products generating $500M+ in revenue. He ensures every project delivers measurable business value.
leadership.education: MBA, Wharton; BS Computer Science, Berkeley

leadership.name: Jennifer Taylor
leadership.title: VP of Client Success
leadership.bio: Jennifer ensures every client achieves their goals with Drexus. With 12 years in enterprise consulting at Accenture and Deloitte, she's managed relationships with Fortune 100 companies. Her team maintains our 100% client satisfaction rate.

leadership.name: Michael Johnson
leadership.title: VP of Design
leadership.bio: Michael leads our design practice, ensuring every product we build is beautiful and intuitive. Former Design Director at Spotify and IDEO, he's won numerous awards for his work. He believes great design is invisible but its impact is unmistakable.
leadership.education: MFA Design, Rhode Island School of Design

leadership.name: Lisa Anderson
leadership.title: VP of People & Culture
